ISSUE.TITLE: _AdminPopupLayout is missing viewport meta tag
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On a mobile device, when a popup is shown in admin area, content is not scaled correctly. Problem is solved by adding this line: `<meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no" name="viewport">` to _AdminPopupLayout, like in regular _AdminLayout file Tested on nopCommerce 4.40.3, but seems to be missing in 4.50 also

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6171 Fixed html viewport value in the admin popup layout
